name: Tiled Together
description:
Hotkeys:
Q, W, E: Select Tile
R: Reroll

Maps are Tiled Together in this world. Journeys are revealed with the turning of ancient ceremonial tiles.  By will alone, you create the landscape for adventurers, merchants, and miscreants. Bring together townsfolk to develop cities, reveal the path to an oasis in the middle of endless sands. Lay the world out in front of everyone. Your craft is a gamble but not without its rewards. A new discovery could result in a windfall of gold and renown! Share your biggest discoveries with other mapmakers, or spread rumors of the creatures the inhabit the deepest waters.

You know of an ancient temple in those mountains? If you deem it so...
You know where the poisonous swamps are formed? Please guide us...

--

There are a handful of tile combinations. Place four of the same tile types together! Or try surrounding your tile on all sides. Bankruptcy is inevitable, but there's always a new map to draw up and new  Share your biggest discoveries with other mapmakers, or spread rumors of the creatures the inhabit the deepest waters.

Code by Boykala
Art & Audio by BurritoEclair

This is our entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 following the theme "Joined Together". This was a very fun project that hit a lot of sweet spots for both of us. Please enjoy, let us know what you thought and don't tell us about bugs.

Spend coins to spin the slot machine and earn coins by joining tiles together.  Some tiles will give coins for being adjacent to other certain tiles.  There are 6 tile group combinations to discover that each has different adjacency bonuses and point values.  Earn as many points as you can before you run out of coins!
